project.name: Cakap
project.description: Cakap is an online learning platform that offers a wide range of courses and training programs to help individuals and organizations enhance their skills and knowledge.

project.name: Appukat Go
project.description: Appukat Go is a technology company focused on providing innovative solutions for the agricultural sector.

project.name: Erha Mobile App
project.description: Erha Mobile App is a application for Customer Erha and Doctor to  improve access to skin and hair health and attract more patients. Break down barriers and connect face-to-face with your patients through video visits, chats, and phone calls in as little as five minutes in the privacy and convenience of your home - or wherever you are, much faster than conventional methods.

project.name: Chakra Reward

project.name: Kalcare Rewards
project.description: Kalcare Rewards is a loyalty program offered by Kalbe, a leading healthcare company in Indonesia, that allows customers to earn points and redeem them for various health and wellness products and services.

project.name: KlikDokter
project.description: KlikDokter is a healthcare platform that provides online medical consultations, health information, and services to help individuals manage their health and well-being.
